channel.title: How can i change the max stat?
channel.description: how can i change the max lvl that people can be on my server and i also want to know how i can change the max money :D

item.title: How can i change the max stat?
item.dc:creator: @aurisdj aurisdj
item.description:
@aurisdj wrote:

Why Dont People say If Its 317 Or 508 Or Whatever… But 317 This IS What You Do
Go To Client.Java And Search This

return 99;

Then Change The 99 To Whatever Max Stat U Want,
HIGHEST SKILL/STAT IS 200
The Code Should Look Like This

return 200;

that’s for max 200 stat

item.title: How can i change the max stat?
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

Uggh, server sided, you search you client.java.
replace your getlevel for xp with this one.
also replace (your max level) with the level you want to be max.

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
  points += Math.floor(
      (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
  output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
  if (output >= exp) {
    return lvl;
  }
}
return (your max level);

}

Read full topic
